translations: v.使麻醉，为……施行麻醉；使麻木不仁

sentences.sentence: That will just anaesthetise the surrounding areas of the tooth to avoid the pain when I pulling out it.
sentences.translation: 这只会麻醉牙齿周围的区域，所以在拨牙齿的时候你不会感到任何疼痛。

sentences.sentence: University of California revealed that, at least for women, the touch or sight of a partner seems to anaesthetise them.
sentences.translation: 加州大学揭示，至少对于女人，触摸或者同伴的目光就能够使得她们缓解情绪。

sentences.sentence: You won't fall asleep and we will not do so. we just anaesthetise the area around your teeth. so you'll not feel any pain when we do it.
sentences.translation: 这只会麻醉牙齿周围的区域，所以在拨牙齿的时候你不会感到任何疼痛。
